channel.title: User accounts
channel.description: Well I am at a friends house using his computer and I am on a limited user account.I am trying to install a game but it won't work on the limited account and he won't let me know his password for admin account.So I was wondering is there anyway I can reset his password or make a new admin account or any other way I can install this game on a limited user account without too much hassle.

item.title: User accounts
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

Never mind,figured out his password.Please lock.

Read full topic

item.title: User accounts
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

open up cmd prompt and type

net user Administrator *

That will ask you for a new password to set onto the admin account, you dont need privaleges and you dont need an old pass

Read full topic

item.title: User accounts
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Frostie21, post:3, topic:206431”][quote author=VB7 Rocks link=topic=272235.msg2230307#msg2230307 date=1211093985]

and he won’t let me know his password for admin account.

Tell him if he wants the game installed to log in to his admin account and have you install it from there.

Problem solved.
[/quote]

He doesn’t care for the game,I just want to play it for a short while we watch a movie I have seen like 25times.[/quote]
Take a knife to his throat, and scream.
“GIEF ME FUKIN MODERATOR PASSWRD BITCH”

Read full topic

item.title: User accounts
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:2, topic:206431”][quote author=Frostie21 link=topic=272235.msg2230302#msg2230302 date=1211093834]
and he won’t let me know his password for admin account.
[/quote]

Tell him if he wants the game installed to log in to his admin account and have you install it from there.

Problem solved.[/quote]

He doesn’t care for the game,I just want to play it for a short while we watch a movie I have seen like 25times.

Read full topic

item.title: User accounts
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Frostie21:

and he won’t let me know his password for admin account.

Tell him if he wants the game installed to log in to his admin account and have you install it from there.

Problem solved.

Read full topic
